title: Bug 13620 - The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has excessive white space
OB: When opening the Java Source Attachment Preference Page, there is a large amount of white space in the text.
EB: The text should be aligned at the top, similar to the other sections on the page.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1) Load a project from the repository
2) Select a source folder
3) Open Properties
4) Select Java Source Attachment
5) In the details section, you will see an info label in the middle of the dialog.
